message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only able to pay up to $7500 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $8250. It's a fair price, considering the product's value to you.
